definitions.definition: something that is used to support or connect things, or to make something stronger:
examples: He was recently fitted with a brace for his bad back.

definitions.definition: a set of connected wires that is attached to a person's teeth in order to make them straight:
examples: I had to wear a brace for my crooked teeth when I was a teenager.

definitions.definition: a pair of narrow straps that stretch from the front of the trousers over your shoulders to the back to hold them up:
metal supports that are fastened to the legs of people who have difficulties with walking
to support an object in order to stop it from falling down:
examples: The side wall of the old house was braced with a wooden support.
